TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItemContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

span.span: Encapsulates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个简单的类，用于封装为提高效率。 is a simple class that encapsulates a for efficiency. 通过让始终处于加载状态的单个类，你可以延迟加载的需要。By having a single class that is always loaded, you can defer the loading of the until it is needed. 因为新的类可以派生自，无法加载，反过来，可以加载已不在内存中程序集。Because new classes can be derived from , you could load a that could, in turn, load an assembly that is not already in memory. 有关的大型集合对象，这可能会导致大量的程序集加载的这会降低性能。For a large collection of objects, this could cause a large number of assemblies to be loaded, which decreases performance. 相反，工具箱服务仅处理获得对象，并检索其包含仅在必要时。Instead, the toolbox service deals only with objects and retrieves their contained only when necessary. 设计为包含从任何缓存的数据， 。The is designed to hold any cached data from the . 默认实现仅支持的筛选器，但派生类可以选择缓存的名称、 映像和其他信息。The default implementation only holds the filter of the , but deriving classes may choose to cache the name, image, and other information. 对象支持两种形式的序列化： 它们可以通过标准运行时序列化序列化和它们还可以加载和保存自身从。 objects support two forms of serialization: they can be serialized through standard runtime serialization, and they can also load and save themselves from a . 前者提供了一种非常简单的方法，以保存到持久存储的对象。The former provides a very easy way to save objects to a persistent storage. 后者提供了如何集成混合的数据存储格式的对象。The latter provides a way to integrate objects with mixed data storage formats.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `data`参数可能包含提供的数据类。The `data` parameter may contain data provided by the class. 它可能包含可由之一读取的数据由用户提供了后的创建者。It may contain data that can be read by one of the creators that have been supplied by the user. 它也可能是与具有剪贴板格式的数据分配给它的创建者。It may also be data with a clipboard format that has a creator assigned to it. 在这种情况下，按需创建。In this case, the is created on demand.

span.para: 通常情况下，不需要重写的序列化机制。对象保存通过实现序列化从返回属性。当你重写并提供你自己的自定义数据，则不包含默认值与此数据实现。仅当你想要存储私有的详细信息，有关此重写默认序列化实现不应通过公共数据对象公开的。

Generally, it is not necessary to override the serialization mechanism for a . objects implement serialization by saving the returned from the property. When you override and provide your own custom data, this data is included with the default implementation. Override the default serialization implementation only if you intend to store private details about this that should not be exposed through the public data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`参数是一个集合表示任何自定义的对象应包含生成筛选器的创建者。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the filter is generated. 自定义创建者可能会导致筛选器。Custom creators may contribute to the filters. 此参数可以为`null`如果不需要任何创建器。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 类型存储在可能有与之关联的筛选器。The types stored in a may have a filter associated with them. 可以使用筛选器来限制可以放置在设计器的工具。Filters can be used to restrict the tools that can be placed on designers.

span.para: 通常情况下，不需要重写的序列化机制类。相反，重写属性并将你自己的数据添加到数据对象。方法在内部使用属性创建序列化信息。重写仅当你想要将私有信息保存有关，不应该保存公共数据对象的一部分。

Generally, it is not necessary to override the serialization mechanism for a class. Instead, override the property and add your own data to the data object. The method internally uses the property to create the serialization info. Override only if you want to save private information about the that should not be saved as part of the public data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`参数是一个集合表示任何自定义的对象时应包括的创建者获取。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the is obtained. 此参数可以为`null`如果不需要任何创建器。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 方法返回表示中存储的数据。The method returns a that represents the data stored in the . 从不返回`null`，也不引发异常，除非在极端情况下 （例如，内存） 不足。 never returns `null`, nor does it ever raise an exception, except in extreme cases (for example, out of memory). 如果不能为制造，相应的异常嵌入在特殊。If a cannot be fabricated, the appropriate exception is embedded within a special . 时将引发异常方法此特殊调用。The exception is thrown when the method on this special is called. 这会将放在用户执行任何操作的异常。This puts the exception at the point of user action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应调用方法时修改工具箱项或将其配置。You should call the method when the toolbox item is modified or configured. 你还应调用它，如果新，后者所做的更改该筛选器，添加。You should also call it if a new , which the changes the filter, is added.
